item.title: Open-Source Analytics Stack on MongoDB, with Schema
item.description:
Description

So your new application is gaining traction. It produces valuable data, stored in MongoDB. Time to exploit it ! But your BI tools and data scientists do not speak schema-less jsonâ€¦ We expose here a full-fledged open-source stack to unlock the analytical potential of your MongoDB data.
item.dc:creator: Pierre-Alain Jachiet
